name: Exebridge
tagline: Focus more on high priority challenges.
description:
Exebridge believes that creating and maintaining a culture based on technical expertise, integrity, hard work, innovative thinking and a “customer-first” mentality is the key to our success. Established in 1997, we provide IT support and services for small and mid-size businesses to enterprise level companies.
Exebridge engineers, consultants and technicians are experts at helping companies build their own strategic applications road maps.
